subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chien-Ming Wang’s season is in jeopardy after seriously injuring his right foot on the base paths Sunday, and C. C. Sabathia instantly became a very important name in the Yankees’ universe.
snippet: Chien-Ming Wang’s season is in jeopardy after seriously injuring his right foot on the base paths Sunday, and C. C. Sabathia instantly became a very important name in the Yankees’ universe.
